ComicInfo.Summary:
Faced with foes in the form of the Star Primas—who have real muscles and matching windbreakers—the Gorgeous Ladies of Wrestling are ready to prove they aren’t unskilled losers. They’re paid television actors! And it’s time to show those Star Primas that paid television actors mean business...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Hannah Templer | 1-2 | RI-A | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover A | Nicoletta Baldari | 3 | RI-B | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover B | Jenn St-Onge | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 09:56:09. [CVDB711007]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Hannah Templer, Jenn St-Onge, Nicoletta Baldari
ComicInfo.Editor: Bobby Curnow, Elizabeth Brei, Megan Brown
